DataIntegrationRecordPurchasePermission.name: DataIntegrationRecordPurchasePermission
DataIntegrationRecordPurchasePermission.description: Indicates Lightning Data purchase credits that a Salesforce admin has granted to users.

ExternalObject.description: Indicates the name of the data service record matched to the Salesforce record.

UserId.description: Indicates the ID of a user to whom purchase credits are assigned.

UserRecordPurchaseLimit.description: Represents the number of purchase credits assigned to a user.
